analyzed: dhītā nu ayam kassa su nanda hoti
akkhāhi me khippam idhā iva puṭṭhaḥ

original: Matyā ca petyā ca athopi assā;
analyzed: matyā ca petyā ca athopi assā

original: Iddho ca phīto ca suvaḍḍhito ca,
analyzed: iddhaḥ ca phītaḥ ca suvaḍḍhitaḥ ca

original: Matyā ca petyā ca kataṁ susādhu;
analyzed: matyā ca petyā ca katam su sādhu
kadā assu mama tamba nakhā su lomā
kadā assu lākhā rasa ratta su chavī
ca me pāpam idam ca jaññā
janinda na aññatra tayā mayā vā
saḥ maññati māyi da maññisu aññe

original: Yuttā ca ye honti narā pathabyā.
analyzed: yuttā ca ye honti narā pathabyā

original: Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā,
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naraḥ pathabyā
tuvan hi mātā ca pitā ca mayha
na tena saḥ jīvati dīgham āyu

original: Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā,
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naraḥ pathabyā

original: Yo evaṁ jānāti sa vedi dhammaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ evam jānāti sa vedi dhamma

original: Añño nu te koci naro pathabyā,
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te koci naraḥ pathabyā
na ca api tyassa nagaramhi pakkhaḥ
yaḥ nā iva nindam na panappasasa

original: Sirī ca lakkhī ca apeti tamhā,
analyzed: sirī ca lakkhī ca apeti tamhā
āpaḥ su vuṭṭhī iva yathā thalamhā

original: Añño nu te ko idha sotthikattā,
analyzed: aññaḥ nu te kaḥ idha sotthika ttā
tuvam nu seṭṭhaḥ tvam anuttarā asi
tvam dhamma guttaḥ dhamma vidū sumedho
so dhamma gutto ciram eva jīva
na id te ujum gate sati
yat ca api me canda sūriyāḥ abhipālayanti
